subject: Automobile Racing
Daytona 500 (Auto Race)
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A rookie driver on Nascar’s Nationwide Series, Kyle Larson is eager to race again after being involved in last week’s crash at Daytona International Speedway.
snippet: A rookie driver on Nascar’s Nationwide Series, Kyle Larson is eager to race again after being involved in last week’s crash at Daytona International Speedway.
